title: Verbal Abuse in the game
body: Sorry , I don't know if  it is the correct place to post it here . But this player abuses in the game quite bad. As there is no tribunal in Oceania server. Is there any way we can do about this?  Completely destroyed my mood of playing.

replies.body: umm....there is an ingame report function...and a mute function....you can just block him and move on after reporting him. simple.
In his defense, your build makes my soul hurt.

Send a support ticket like I did. Just apply your images to the ticket and state your case. I did for a guy almost that bad telling me to kill myself blah blah blah. Usually I ignore and mute it but no one should ever be told to kill themselves. I draw the line there. I got a response less than 24hrs after I submitted my complaint and was told they'd investigate that player. They'll also tell you to also report inside the client and always write a description in the comments. Riot stated not long ago reports with no comments are often not looked upon than those with comments. Hope that helps you.
why do you even care what that guy thinks? hes obviously mad. Ignore and move on.
